title: 1970's Ford F600 Dump Truck (Not Running)
item_description:
1970's Ford F600 Dump Truck (Not Running)

Specifications

  • Year: 1970's
    • No VIN record, unable to verify year
  • Make: Ford

  • VIN: F70EV052717
    • VIN RECORD NOT ON FILE.
  • Odometer Reads: 83,727
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 24,500lbs
  • Drive Type: Rear Wheel Drive

  • Tire Size: 10.00R20

Interior

Removal Note: Buyer is responsible for all aspects of loading and removal of this lot. No assistance will be provided by the Seller. Please come prepared with trailer, tow truck, etc, and bid accordingly.

Note: Bill of Sale only. The VIN found was verified with the California DMV, where no record was found. Therefore, the buyer will receive a Bill of Sale only, which will be mailed within 1 week of pickup. Buyer is fully responsible for the new registration process, transfer, fees, application for new license plates, and inspections due to DMV to register this item in the Buyer's name if they so choose to obtain a new title/VIN/License/registration.
